message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $20,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose an offer of $12,000 for the product.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $18,000. This is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to your business.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I still believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $15,000 for the product.
